option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added code coverage reports, increasing the coverage

MESSAGE.value: Added updateChangedColumnsOnly configuration parameter
Added basics for query language
Different selection mechanisms for selection criteria
Selections criteria to use expressions
Expressions for conditions, now we are going somewhere
Expressions for conditions
Refactoring tests
grouping/ordering/group conditions :) with that we are there, need to add complicated tests now
bit of a refactoring, specially how the classes are registered
renaming classes/ changing structure
Changing the structure
Revert: Added adding,removing and altering columns when patching
Trying to sort out damn svn conflict
Structure changes
Optimizations and refactoring
Ability to define relationship with base class and enable to related classes instead of defining individual relationships for sub classes

{{{java.sql.Connection}}} usage in data access is replaced with new {{{ITransaction}}}, this will prove to be invaluable when it comes to improving performance (as my friend Johannes mentioned) via batching this will come in handy.

java.sql.Connection usage in data access is replaced with new ITransaction, this will prove to be invaluable when it comes to improving performance (as my friend Johannes mentioned) via batching this will come in handy.
Some refactoring on the tests
Multiple database support
Got rid of the requirement of having separate column for each related items (e.g. currently if class A has reference to B, then A has to have both private int bId; and private B b fields in class A.
Some refactoring
Entity level configuration flexibility (define change tracking,version management strategies in the entity level)
Added code coverage reports, increasing the coverage
